pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate the incidence and resolution of sexual adverse experiences (AEs) in men with benign prostatic hyperplasia treated with finasteride 5 mg compared with placebo.

metaData.source:
Five year expanded prostate cancer index composite-based quality of life outcomes after prostatectomy for localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20804482/
